```{r}
library("RprobitB")
```

```{r}
data("choice_berserk")
choice_berserk$rating_diff <- choice_berserk$rating_white - choice_berserk$rating_black
form <- berserk_white ~ 0 | rating_diff + minutes_remaining
data <- prepare_data(form = form,
                     choice_data = choice_berserk,
                     id = "id_white",
                     standardize = c("rating_diff","minutes_remaining"))
model <- mcmc(data, R = 200)
plot(coef(model))
```
